name: Fullscope
overview: Fullscope, Inc. develops and supports process industries for Microsoft Dynamics AX software products. The company markets Microsoft Dynamics AX, an enterprise resource management system for manufacturers that includes business analysis, an enterprise portal, supply chain management, customer response management, human resource management, and financial management modules; Dynamics AX, a multi-language and multicurrency enterprise resource planning solution; and Wise XE, an ERP tool kit that offers a seamless and integrated platform, which enables Web-based collaborative commerce among manufacturers, suppliers, partners, and customers. It also offers consulting, implementation, and training and education services for Microsoft Dynamics AX systems; and Microsoft ERP Hosting/ASP programs, including design of custom applications, up gradation of service packs and patches, and personalization and customization of overlay management. The company serves food and beverage, life sciences, pharmaceuticals, specialty chemicals, primary metals, and pulp and paper industries. It has operations in the United States and Canada. The company was founded in 1999 as Workwired.com, Inc. and changed its name to Fullscope, Inc. in 2000. Fullscope, Inc. is headquartered in Athens, Alabama with regional offices in Montreal, Canada; and San Jose, California. It also has sales and satellite offices in Los Angeles, California; Chicago, Illinois; Ann Arbor, Michigan; Portland, Oregon; Minneapolis, Minnesota; Durham, North Carolina; and Vancouver, Canada, as well as in Italy and Portugal. As of December 31, 2009, Fullscope, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Edgewater Technology Inc.

acquisition.source_description: MS Dynamics Consultant Fullscope Sells To Edgewater For Up To $15M
